Description:

Fight like an animal! Game Bloody Roar: Primal Fury - this fighting game. A key feature of the project compared to other games of the genre - here each of the sixteen available characters has the ability to transform into an animal, and to fight in this guise.

Features:

- Series is known for its unique gameplay. 
- Game 16 characters, each of which has its original and transformed human form of the animal. 
- Depending on whether the player during the match to take human form or shape of an animal at his disposal will different set of special attack techniques. 
- Also, there are seven game modes: five single-player modes and two modes for two players who can battle each other using the selected characters. 
- Fights will take place on multilevel interactive arenas in which you can knock punching walls and floor. 
- You will be able to show their fighting qualities in quick and merciless fights. - The game is incredibly addictive fast fights with smooth animation, dizzying tricks, special effects and dynamic lighting.

Features of Release:

- Game settings - as in the full version of PC
- Good performance
- Additional software (DirectX, Microsoft Visual C++ Redist 64/32 bit)
- Bilingual installer (English/Russian) with Original Game Soundtrack and Slideshow
- Installation of 2-3 minutes
